blog.name: luki-fanfic
blog.title: Luki's Fanfiction
blog.description: So quite a few people seem to like posting fic on Tumblr - thought I'd might try it myself.  Don't expect many updates, just liked the idea of a place I could throw ideas I'm never going to use out into the word (in addition to the stuff I actually do!)

title: Present Mic Hair Theory
body:
It’ll probably be no surprise to anyone that I’ve got a soft spot for Present Mic.  But the more I get into BNHA the more I keep thinking about his hair.  As a teen it was styled, but it was relatively short.  And that mane is not something you handle without serious commitment, ESPECIALLY if you’re going to wear it up the way he does.  The weight alone would probably require training to avoid neck injury (and if you think I’m exaggerating, ask any cosplayer or actor that’s needed to wear a heavy wig).

So, I wondered if there might be a reason a hero, who has 3 jobs and really does NOT need a huge heavy weight causing him headaches and neck strain whenever he’s working.  And then…well, an Aizawa/Yamada theory popped into my head and made me laugh.

- The reason Present Mic has hair half the length of his body is because of a bet.

- It started after he and Shouta graduated.  In the world of heroes, image is important, and Hizashi started to tease his friend about his messy mop.  At some point, Hizashi tells him that he should just cut it short if he doesn’t want to care about it.

- Shouta argues that having it long means he can just tie it back, while having it short means it’s completely uncontrollable.  It might not look great, but he’s used to it.

- Hizashi, probably running high on graduation, suggests that Shouta’s just too lazy to get it cut, because hair that long can’t possible be comfortable.  Shouta, feeling snarky, argues that Hizashi would never be able to handle long hair.  

- So the bet is cast.  Hizashi loses if he cuts his hair.

- Aizawa immediately has an edge.  Hizashi’s entire knowledge of hair care consists of ‘run some gel through until it spikes up’ which isn’t really going to be effective once it gets past a few inches.

- As expected, Hizashi becomes the butt of a lot of jokes for being unable to manage his hair, while Aizawa, an underground hero, gets no comments for his unruly mop.  It hides his features, and he can tie it back when he needs to look professional.  Hizashi still has to endure the ‘too long to leave alone but too short to tie back stage’

- At some point, Hizashi leaves for a hero exchange in America.  Aizawa fully expects him to come back with a cropped skull, because his hair is almost shoulder length at this point and he still hasn’t figured out how to style it.  He’s still spiking it straight up, and it looks ridiculous.  American heroes who aren’t used to Hizashi will no doubt torment him for it even more than his Japanese co-workers.

- When he gets back, Aizawa is looking forward to seeing him.  Not only because he hasn’t seen his best friend/crush in person for almost a year, but because he own hair is getting a tad longer than he likes to have it, and he’s looking forward to the vindication before he goes to the barbers himself.

- However, Nemuri sees Hizashi first and warns Aizawa not to celebrate. Hizashi’s ‘crown’ is now 2 foot long and makes him look like a cockatoo.  Aizawa wonders why the hell he’s in love with this idiot.

- He visits him that evening to catch up, and arrives to find Hizashi blow drying his hair. Apparently his time in the US helped him figure out how to use one, and now his mane is lying flat against his back. There are also a dozen products in the bathroom, and Hizashi moans to Aizawa about how much effort his mother must have gone to when her hair was this long.-

- Aizawa however, isn’t saying a word.  Because his brain is too busy looping ‘humana, humana, humana’ on repeat.

- Turns out, Hizashi with long hair is hot.  True, Aizawa’s been in love with his former classmate for years, but long haired Yamada is going to be the star of just about every dream he has for the next five years.  Because, HELLO! kink he didn’t know he had.  Aizawa silently vows to never let it be cut.

- Of course this has issues, because that’s A LOT of hair, especially the way Hizashi wears it. He’s even had to start taking ballet lessons because the weight of his hair was starting to effect his neck and balance.  The man is committed to his bets.

- Resulting in Aizawa’s next new kink.  Long haired Hizashi on a bar wearing leg warmers.

- Nemuri has started recommending different styles for Yamada to try.  The man is determined to master every type of braid by his next birthday. Aizawa has managed to angle himself into ‘begrudgingly’ helping him practice almost every time.

BONUS

- Yamada is actually completely aware of the effect his hair has on Aizawa due to seeing his expression in a mirror one time during his beauty routine.  He’s already sworn to never let clippers anywhere near his head.

- Most people in UA are aware of this decade long bet.  None of them care

- The pool on ‘what hairstyle that we recommend to Yamada will FINALLY make Aizawa jump his bones’ is FAR more lucrative.

summary: My hero academia Dakimakura Voting  After I saw some Dakimakuras of Katsuki and Deku on a smallConvention this weekand I tried...
body:
My hero academia Dakimakura Voting

After I saw some Dakimakuras of Katsuki and Deku on a smallConvention this weekand I tried to draw some  grown up heros - Pillows:)

And now I ask you who you want to see colored ^3^
The character with the most votes will get the chance to be colored
the charas are
-Bakugou
-Midoriya
-Yaoyorozu
-Asui
-Kaminari

I hope it works, but you can find the voting here


https://goo.gl/forms/ntGPkpHODFt6l7NJ3


Some Details
The characters will be young adults,
They aren’t naked, just a little nude
The hero suits are similiar to the one in the Manga
I only draw the characters at their curent age as commission on pillow!!!!


An coloring example is here https://www.deviantart.com/shizuri-chan/art/Prompto-Dakimakura-WIP-697172290

blog.description: This was supposed to be a homestuck blog but I never really got invested/ I'm just gonna put random stuff here, advice and whatnot/ call me whatever you want

summary:
Bakugou: You! Deku! Too strong! Explain now!

 Todoroki: He recieved the quirk One For All.

 Bakugou: The fucks One For...
body:
Bakugou: You! Deku! Too strong! Explain now!

Todoroki: He recieved the quirk One For All.

Bakugou: The fucks One For All?

Kaminari: Basically the most powerful quirk ever.

Bakugou: But I still have my quirk!

Todoroki: Do you believe your own hype that much!?

Bakugou: I AM THE HYPE!!!

blog.name: bnha-mtc-writing
blog.title: BNHA meet the characters
blog.description:
[new] BNHA meet the character blog! 
send in a Ask- can be a question or simply an interaction- for a character and they will reply!
Call me Winry~

summary: @Iida, according to google, “In the Naruto series, characters often have their hands and arms straight out behind them to...
question: @Iida, according to google, “In the Naruto series, characters often have their hands and arms straight out behind them to decrease air resistance.” You should naruto run with your quirk! It may benefit you!
answer: Iida: “thank you very much for your help and advice! I shall start practice immediately!!”

reblog.comment: Iida: “thank you very much for your help and advice! I shall start practice immediately!!”

trail.content_raw: Iida: “thank you very much for your help and advice! I shall start practice immediately!!”
trail.content: Iida: “thank you very much for your help and advice! I shall start practice immediately!!”

summary: (*Huggles Toga*)  You may be evil but you're to goddamned cute to not hug ;w;
question: (*Huggles Toga*)  You may be evil but you're to goddamned cute to not hug ;w;
answer: Toga: “Awh, well geez dont you just flatter me? Come here pumpkin gimme another hug! You and I are young to be best friends~”
